column2:
"/ci2 1 Oh, <%me>!
I was just fighting these enemies with Harriet. Do you want to join us?"
"/ci2 1 We did it! Thanks for your help. We should come back here later."
"Ugh... Looks like that's it for me. I got overexcited about wearing this cute swimsuit and overstretched myself. Sorry..."

"Harriet! You rest there...
We'll take them out in your place!"
